User-agent: *
Allow: /
Sitemap: https://www.newagefotografie.com/sitemap.xml

# Block development and admin areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_vite/
Disallow: /node_modules/

# Allow search engines to crawl important pages
Allow: /galerie
Allow: /preise  
Allow: /kontakt
Allow: /blog
Allow: /fotoshootings
